title: Keq from delta H and delta S

content.question: A reaction is known to have a negative value of <math alttext="delta H naught" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>H</mi><mo>°</mo></math> and a positive value of <math alttext="delta S naught" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>S</mi><mo>°</mo></math>. Which of the following statements correctly describes the equilibrium constant, <math alttext="K sub e q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="italic">e</mi><mi mathvariant="italic">q</mi></mrow></msub></math>, for this reaction?

choices.label: <math alttext="K sub e q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="italic">e</mi><mi mathvariant="italic">q</mi></mrow></msub></math> will be less than <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> only at high temperatures.

<math alttext="K sub e q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="italic">e</mi><mi mathvariant="italic">q</mi></mrow></msub></math> will be less than <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> at all temperatures.

<math alttext="K sub e q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="italic">e</mi><mi mathvariant="italic">q</mi></mrow></msub></math> will be greater than <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> only at low temperatures.

<math alttext="K sub e q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="italic">e</mi><mi mathvariant="italic">q</mi></mrow></msub></math> will be greater than <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> at all temperatures.

content.answer: <math alttext="K sub e q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="italic">e</mi><mi mathvariant="italic">q</mi></mrow></msub></math> will be greater than <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> at all temperatures.

skill.text: 5.B: Identify an appropriate theory, definition, or mathematical relationship to solve a problem.
